===Etymology===
From {{etyl|ltc|ja|sort=れんさ}} compound {{m|zh|連鎖|tr=ljen swa<sup>X</sup>|lit=connect in a row + chain}}. Compare modern {{etyl|cmn|-}} reading ''liánsuǒ''.
